text: Roy Thomas Edmond Bergiers (born 11 November 1950) is a former Welsh international rugby union player. Bergiers was born in Carmarthen. In 1974 he toured South Africa with the British Lions and at the time played club rugby for Llanelli. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby union players from Carmarthen Category:Wales international rugby union players Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:British and Irish Lions rugby union players from Wales Category:Llanelli RFC players
